pr_title: KOGITO-4145 Move workitems to their own module

timeline.message: restrict imports, move WorkItemManager Factory only to tests -- not used elsewhere
move workitems to their own module
move workitems to their own module

timeline.bodyText: @evacchi  its a test class but in src/main/java just to make sure its correct or duplicated with the one in test?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: I think the idea was to use the one in the jar, but it is basically a 1-liner so I ended up duplicating. I am deleting this one.
replies.author: evacchi
